review: Sir, listened fully & then told to walk , then toe walk, heel walk . Then moved both the legs in particular postures. Thereafter x- ray to be more clear . Further the reason for the hip pain & then the medication & physiotherapist refernce. So everything done & explained in toto with clarity & confidence.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I strongly suggest not to visit this doctor. ** ******* **** *** ** **** ** **** i have severe lower back pain for several years due to a physical injury during childhood.he looked at my MRI and said that i have a malformed tailbone that is rubbing against the top vertebrae. he did not listen to my narrative of what caused the pain. said surgery was not needed and asked to go in for an injection, a day care proceedure which costs 30k. I felt sad and visited another doctor for a second opinion, ** ***** ** ***** ***** *** ***** ***** *********** **** ****** ********* ** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** ** ***** *** ****** ***** **** **** ****** *** ***** **** ** **** *** *

review: He identified the symptoms by making examination of the way I walk and found the nerve compression creating numbness and weakness of  left toe . Suggested furthethe nerve maping for both the lower limbs and fixed an appointment with Dr. Bhuvaneshwari in Kaveri Hospital promptly for 7th June morning and then review recommended for a cure .
It's a wonderfull treatment and visit by Dr phani kiran ..... we are very much satisfied.  Thanks always to Gleneagles Global Hospital chennai . I will always prefer global hospital..... thank  you
